path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Iosiro/Iosiro-Synthetix SIP-65 Circuit Breaker Smart Contract Audit.pdf

findings.title: High Deviation Factor
findings.description: The `priceDeviationThreshold` factor was initialized to `3e18`, which corresponded to a factor of 3 and could be adjusted via an SCCP if deemed necessary by the community.
